name: Frozen Sea
desc: A collaboration of BL Book and Wamy Water. Endless waves of ice that slows targets.

name: BL Fujoshi
desc: A collaboration of BL Book and Psycho Axe. Endless BL, how shameless!

name: MiComet
desc: A collaboration of Elite Lava Bucket and Psycho Axe. Real business partners.

name: Elite Cooking
desc: A collaboration of Elite Lava Bucket and Spider Cooking. May have severe unknown side effects if consumed.

name: Broken Dreams
desc: A collaboration of Spider Cooking and CEO's Tears.

name: Stream of Tears
desc: A collaboration of Fan Beam and CEO's Tears. Nothing can stop the stream of tears.

name: Rap Dog
desc: A collaboration of X-Potato and Idol Song. Drop some HOT BEATS where targets hit take 15% more damage.

name: Idol Concert
desc: A collaboration of Idol Song and Glowstick. Throw glowstick in all directions that esxplode into song!

name: Light Beam
desc: A collaboration of Glowstick and Fan Beam. Throw glowsticks that explode into targeted beams!

name: Dragon Fire
desc: A collaboration of Fan Beam and Plug In Type Asacoco. The power of a once LEGENDARY Dragon. The OG.

name: Breathe-In Type Asacoco
desc: A collaboration of PLug Type Asacoco and Holo Bomb. Limited time only for 5000 yen!!!

name: Flattening Board
desc: A collaboration of Cutting Board and Holo Bomb. Feel the wrath of cutting boards...!?.

name: Spider Cooking
desc: Create an area of miasma around, dealing slow damage to enemies inside.

name: Elite Lava Bucket
desc: Drop lava on the ground, burning targets slowly.

levels.desc: Increase damage by 30% and increase duration of lava by 1 second.
Throw 4 lava buckets and increase lava size by 20%.

name: Holo Bomb
desc: A bomb that explodes, dealing damage to all nearby targets.

levels.desc: Reduce the time between attacks by 20%.

name: Psycho Axe
desc: Throw an axe that spirals outward from the player.

levels.desc: Increase size of axe by 20%. Increase damage by 20%.
Increase damage by 33%, and size by 20%.
Remove hit limit, and lasts 1 second longer.

name: BL Book
desc: Repel targets with orbitting BL Books.

levels.desc: Increase damage by 30% and increase duration by 1 second.

name: Cutting Board
desc: Create a defensive wall that damages targets behind you. Effectiveness is increased on certain characters.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Ina in one run.

levels.desc: Increase size of the wall by 30%
Reduce the time between attacks by 0.5 seconds.

name: Fan Beam
desc: Shoot a powerful laser beam from the microphone. Horizontal Only.

name: Plug Type Asacoco
desc: Fire a fast piercing tail targeted at a random target.

name: Glowstick
desc: Throw a glowstick to a nearby target and then spins back to player.

levels.desc: Increase hit limit by 10 and throw one additional glowstick.

name: Idol Song
desc: Magical music notes that float vertically in both directions.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Irys in one run.

levels.desc: Reduce the time between attacks by 20%.

name: CEO's Tears
desc: Fires rapid tears at random targets.

levels.desc: Reduce the time between attacks by 33%.
Tears are 25% faster and increase damage by 20%.
Reduce the time between attacks by 50%.

name: X-Potato
desc: Throw a potato that bounces around the screen before exploding into an X.

levels.desc: Increase the X explosion size by 20%.
Reduce the time between attacks by 15% and remove hit limit.
Increase the size of potatoes and the X explosion size by 30%.

name: Wamy Water
desc: Create a splash of unknown water in front, knocking targets back.

levels.desc: Increase attack area by 30% and stops enemies for a short moment after knockback.

name: Sake
desc: If not taking any damage for 5 seconds, increase crit by {10%}. Buff ends upon receiving damage. If eating food, +5% crit for 10 seconds.

levels.desc: If not taking any damage for 5 seconds, increase crit by {15%}. Buff ends upon receiving damage. If eating food, +5% crit for 10 seconds.
If not taking any damage for 5 seconds, increase crit by {20%}. Buff ends upon receiving damage. If eating food, +5% crit for 10 seconds.

name: Body Pillow
desc: Gain a shield that absorbs up to {15} damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes. Also reduces damage taken by {5%}.

levels.desc: Gain a shield that absorbs up to {20} damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes. Also reduces damage taken by {10%}.
Gain a shield that absorbs up to {25} damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes. Also reduces damage taken by {15%}.
Gain a shield that absorbs up to {30} damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes. Also reduces damage taken by {20%}.
Gain a shield that absorbs up to {35} damage. Every 15 seconds, this shield refreshes. Also reduces damage taken by {25%}.

name: Injection Type Asacoco
desc: Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain {40%} damage.
requirement: Beat Stage Mode with an Asacoco product (only Tail Plug and Breathe-In Type Asacoco works, not Dragon Fire)

levels.desc: Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain {60%} damage.
Lose 5% HP every second (until 1 HP remains), but gain {80%} damage.

name: Credit Card
desc: Cost of enhancing is reduced by {20%} and anvils appear {20%} more often.

levels.desc: Cost of enhancing is reduced by {25%} and anvils appear {40%} more often.
Cost of enhancing is reduced by {30%} and anvils appear {60%} more often.
Cost of enhancing is reduced by {35%} and anvils appear {80%} more often.
Cost of enhancing is reduced by {40%} and anvils appear {100%} more often.

name: Knightly Milk
desc: Increases attack range of area-type weapons by {10%}. Also Increase pick-up radius by {30%}.

levels.desc: Increases attack range of area-type weapons by {15%}. Also Increase pick-up radius by {40%}.
Increases attack range of area-type weapons by {20%}. Also Increase pick-up radius by {50%}.

super.name: Super Knightly Milk
super.desc: Increases attack size of weapons by 30%. Also increase Pick Up Range by 100% and increase Max HP by 20.

name: Face Mask
desc: Increase damage by 50% and haste by 10%. Take 30% more damage.

name: Plushie
desc: After taking any damage, gain invulnerability for {0.3} seconds. However, you also lose 20% ATK and SPD for 5 seconds.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Bae in one run.

levels.desc: After taking any damage, gain invulnerability for {0.4} seconds. However, you also lose 20% ATK and SPD for 5 seconds.
After taking any damage, gain invulnerability for {0.5} seconds. However, you also lose 20% ATK and SPD for 5 seconds.

name: Nurse's Horns
desc: When a target is defeated, there is a 20% chance to heal for {2} HP.

levels.desc: When a target is defeated, there is a 20% chance to heal for {4} HP.
When a target is defeated, there is a 20% chance to heal for {6} HP.

name: Full Meal
desc: All healing is doubled.

name: Piki Piki Piman
desc: After receiving damage, increase the special meter by {2%}. There is a 0.2 second cooldown.

levels.desc: After receiving damage, increase the special meter by {3%}. There is a 0.2 second cooldown.
After receiving damage, increase the special meter by {4%}. There is a 0.2 second cooldown.

name: Headphones
desc: {15%} chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.

levels.desc: {20%} chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.
{25%} chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.
{30%} chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.
{35%} chance to negate 1 hit, and create a shockwave that knocks back all enemies.

name: Gorilla's Paw
desc: Increase normal attack damage by {30%}, but lose 20% critical chance.

levels.desc: Increase normal attack damage by {40%}, but lose 20% critical chance.
Increase normal attack damage by {50%}, but lose 20% critical chance.

super.name: Super Gorilla's Paw
super.desc: Increase attack damage by 50% and critical hits do 50 more damage.

name: Uber Sheep
desc: Every {10} seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by {10%}.

levels.desc: Every {9} seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by {12%}.
Every {8} seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by {15%}.
Every {7} seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by {18%}.
Every {6} seconds, food will drop closeby. Also increase food drop chance from defeated targets by {20%}.

name: Idol Costume
desc: Reduce Special cooldown by {20%}.

super.name: Super Idol Costume
super.desc: Reduce Special cooldown by 45%. Allows the use of Special once more immediately per charge.

name: Energy Drink
desc: Increase Haste by {10%} and SPD by {30%}, but reduce Max HP by 20% as well.
requirement: Survive for 10 minutes using Calli in one run.

levels.desc: Increase Haste by {15%} and SPD by {40%}, but reduce Max HP by 20% as well.
Increase Haste by {20%} and SPD by {50%}, but reduce Max HP by 20% as well.

super.name: Super Energy Drink
super.desc: Increase Haste by 30% and SPD by 60%.

name: Study Glasses
desc: Increase EXP gain by {10%}.

name: Super Chatto Time!
desc: Targets drop {10%} more Holo Coins.
requirement: Obtain 5000 coins total. (you only need to have 5000 total at the end of a run, not from a single run)

super.name: Super Super Chatto Time!
super.desc: Targets drop 100% more Holo Coins. Picking up coins also heal 3 HP.

name: Membership
desc: Lose 3 Holocoin every second. If Holocoins is more than 0, increase damage by {30%} and take {10%} less damage.
requirement: Clear Stage 1 with Super Chatto Time!

levels.desc: Lose 3 Holocoin every second. If Holocoins is more than 0, increase damage by {40%} and take {18%} less damage.
Lose 3 Holocoin every second. If Holocoins is more than 0, increase damage by {50%} and take {25%} less damage.

name: Halu
desc: Increase regular fan spawns, and fans become {5%} stronger. Gain 1 HoloCoin for every {5} targets defeated since taking this item.

levels.desc: Increase regular fan spawns more, and fans become {15%} stronger. Gain 1 HoloCoin for every {4} targets defeated since taking this item.
Increase regular fan spawns further, and fans become {25%} stronger. Gain 1 HoloCoin for every {3} targets defeated since taking this item.
Increase regular fan spawns even further beyond, and fans become {33%} stronger. Are you sure about this?

name: Just Bandage
desc: Increase Max HP by {10}. After being hit, heal 10% HP every 3 seconds until {80%} of the damage taken is recovered (recovers minimum 1 HP).

levels.desc: Increase Max HP by {20}. After being hit, heal 10% HP every 3 seconds until {90%} of the damage taken is recovered (recovers minimum 1 HP).
Increase Max HP by {30}. After being hit, heal 10% HP every 3 seconds until {100%} of the damage taken is recovered (recovers minimum 1 HP).

name: GWS Pill
desc: While the Special meter is still charging, increase crit by {15%}.

levels.desc: While the Special meter is still charging, increase crit by {20%}.
While the Special meter is still charging, increase crit by {25%}.

name: Limiter
desc: Gain {100%} Pick Up Range.

name: Chicken's Feather
desc: Gain {1} revive. When HP reaches 0, instantly refill back to 50% HP and all current targets except Bosses will be defeated.

levels.desc: Gain {2} revive. When HP reaches 0, instantly refill back to 50% HP and all current targets except Bosses will be defeated.
Gain {3} revive. When HP reaches 0, instantly refill back to 50% HP and all current targets except Bosses will be defeated.

name: Stolen Piggy Bank
desc: Gain 1 coin every second and increase SPD by 15%. However, reduce Pick Up Range by 50%.
